LISP34.title: Space Circus
LISP34.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 34 Space Circus.m4v
LISP34.description: A space circus comes to town and the owner wants Will to run away with it.

STAN07.title: The Infinite Vulcan
STAN07.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 07 The Infinite Vulcan.m4v
STAN07.description: On a planet of intelligent plantlike creatures, the clone of a human scientist clones Mr. Spock for use in a galactic peace mission.

LITB034.title: Beaver's Bad Day
LITB034.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 034 Beaver's Bad Day.mp4
LITB034.description: The whole Cleaver family learns a lesson in truthfulness after Eddie Haskell intimidates Beaver into lying about how his good suit pants were torn.

RT66014.title: Play it Glissando
RT66014.description: Tod and Buz, vacationing in Malibu, California, are drawn into the world of a paranoid Progressive Jazz trumpeter and his wife. Told largely in flashback by Buz, beginning innocently enough with Buz having made a connection with lounge songstress Kitty Parker.

MSTK0107.title: Robot Monster
MSTK0107.description: The guys watch a post-apocalyptic film about aliens and robots, riff on two more installments of "Radar Men from the Moon", and try to understand surrealism.

RBBT10.title: Gotcha!
RBBT10.description: At a masquerade party, a lonely man dressed as comedian Oliver Hardy is about to leave, when he meets a woman costumed as Hardy's comic partner Stan Laurel. Captivated with each other, they run off into the night. They stay in love and in their fantasy, until the man muses if this dream can last? The woman suggests they see, by playing a game she calls Gotcha.

FETM06.title: Mare Tranquilitatis
FETM06.path: ../From the Earth to the Moon/From the Earth to the Moon - 6 Mare Tranquilitatis.m4v
FETM06.description: Buzz Aldrin, Neil Armstrong, and Michael Collins prepare for the Apollo 11 mission to the moon.

LISP32.title: The Ghost Planet
LISP32.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 32 The Ghost Planet.m4v
LISP32.description: Smith makes the Jupiter 2 land on a planet occupied by cyborgs.

RT66013.title: The Quick and the Dead
RT66013.description: Tod and Buz are in California for the Riverside Grand Prix auto races which Tod decides to enter in the Stock-Class.Doing well in practice,he is asked to drive in the main event.After being drawn into the conflict between a veteran driver,his daughter and second wife, Tod nearly is "rerouted" in more ways than one.

DRHI07.title: Nashville
DRHI07.description: Lewis and Clark explore the dangerous west, evolution is questioned in the controversial "trial of the century," and Dolly Parton has to leave the man who made her famous. Guest starring Tony Hale, Aubrey Plaza, Jack McBrayer and more.

OFUK07.title: Merger
OFUK07.description: It's the day of the big merger. The Swindon branch has closed and several of the staff, including the new manager of the combined Slough Branch, Neil Godwin, arrive.

LITB033.title: Wally's Job
LITB033.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 033 Wally's Job.mp4
LITB033.description: Wally hedges after making a deal with his dad to paint the trashcans for fifty cents each, convinced by Eddie Haskell to hold out for more money. But when Beaver takes the job at the original price, causing hard feelings between the brothers, Ward looks for a compromise to satisfy everyone and finds, in the end, that boys will be boys and moms are full of surprises.

LISP31.title: Wild Adventure
LISP31.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 31 Wild Adventure.m4v
LISP31.description: Smith finds the course back to earth, but a space female lures Smith out of the ship. Saving him would again leave the crew of the Jupiter 2 lost in space.

ULTR14.title: The Pearl Defense Directive
ULTR14.description: A pearl-eating monster wreaks havoc on world pearl prices, much to Fuji's consternation.

ACGS07.path: ../All Creatures Great and Small/All Creatures Great and Small - 07 The Night Before Christmas.m4v
ACGS07.title: The Night Before Christmas

ULTR13.title: Oil S.O.S.
ULTR13.description: A giant bat-like monster travels the planet eating the world's oil.

LITB032.title: Beaver's Old Friend
LITB032.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 032 Beaver's Old Friend.mp4
LITB032.description: Memories of companionship and comfort prevent Beaver from letting go of his well-worn teddy bear, Billy, and prompt the little boy to rescue his furry friend from the garbage truck even though Ward and Wally tease that he's "too old" to play with dolls.

CADF08.title: The Rose Rent
CADF08.description: A beautiful, wealthy widow turns her back on the world to find solace with the church and gives her house over to the abbey for the rent of a single white rose each year.

SPRA14.title: The Desperate Desert Race (part 1)
SPRA14.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 14 The Desperate Desert Race (part 1).mp4
SPRA14.description: Speed is forced into a duel-race in the desert with Prince Kim Jugger, the wildest driver in the world.

SOKO07.title: Our Enemy: Scalion
SOKO07.description: There is the decoding office of the Japanese Branch of Unicorn Organization in the basement of a lighthouse on the coast of the Pacific Ocean.

BSG107.title: The Magnificent Warriors
BSG107.path: ../Battlestar Galactica TOS/Battlestar Galactica 08 - The Magnificent Warriors.m4v
BSG107.description: After the Cylons destroy two of the fleet's Agro ships and cripple the last remaining one, Adama hopes to swap an old energizer for seed on the the planet Sectar in Quadrant Zeta. Unfortunately, Siress Belloby won't give up the energizer unless the commander courts her.

PATV06.title: Tomorrow's Tide
PATV06.path: ../Planet Of The Apes (Television)/Planet Of The Apes TV 06.mp4
PATV06.description: While walking on an ocean beach with Galen, Virdon and Burke see a condemned man lashed to a raft in the water.

SPRA13.title: Race for Revenge (part 2)
SPRA13.description: Speed and Trixie try to stop Flash Jr from carrying out his vengeance, but he swears to eliminate them for interfering.

LRSS07.title: Hank's Contract
LRSS07.path: ../Larry Sanders Show, The/Larry Sanders Show, The - 07 Hank's Contract.m4v
LRSS07.description: Hank threatens to leave the show without a better contract.

TREK13.title: The Conscience of the King
TREK13.path: ../Star Trek TOS/Star Trek - 13 The Conscience of the King.mp4
TREK13.description: While Captain Kirk investigates whether an actor is actually a presumed dead mass murderer, a mysterious assailant is killing the people who could identify the fugitive.

LITB031.title: New Doctor
LITB031.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 031 New Doctor.mp4
LITB031.description: Impressed by all the attention Wally receives while in bed with a sore throat, Beaver decides to get some for himself by pretending to be sick.

CON107.title: The Long Chain
CON107.description: Coal tar, ammonia, quinine, synthetic dyes are among a few of the connected discoveries in history that lead to the present.

ICLD07.title: Queen of Heaven
ICLD07.description: Tiberius embarks on a series of acts of debauchery, having sex with anybody he pleases, with Caligula a willing participant.

POTO1925.title: Phantom of the Opera (1925)
POTO1925.description: Lon Chaney in the title role of the deformed Phantom who haunts the Paris Opera House, causing murder and mayhem in an attempt to make the woman he loves a star. Silent.

TPOD07.title: Chateau Ricordeau, France: August, 2089 AD
TPOD07.description: Henry and Beanpole continue on their trip, wondering if Will will catch up with them later. Meanwhile, Will is dealt a shocking blow by his rival for the love of Eloise.

FWLT07.title: Communications Problem
FWLT07.description: When Mrs. Richards, a demanding woman who is hard of hearing, checks into the hotel, Basil, Sybil and Polly find themselves with a very difficult customer. Meanwhile, Basil bets on a horse that is sure to win, however he must not let Sybil find out.

EF100CEE.path: ../Kaiju (Giant Monsters)/Mothra vs. Godzilla (Godzilla #4, Godzilla vs. the Thing, 1964, dubbed).m4v
EF100CEE.title: Mothra vs. Godzilla (Godzilla #4, Godzilla vs. the Thing, 1964, dubbed)

ULTR06J.path: ../Ultraman (Japanese, Engligh Subtitled)/Ultraman - 06 The Coast Guard Command.mp4
ULTR06J.title: The Coast Guard Command

LITB035.title: Boarding School
LITB035.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 035 Boarding School.mp4
LITB035.description: Initially impressed by Johnny Franklin's military academy uniform and good manners when Wally's former schoolmate comes to visit, June becomes alarmed when, as a result, Wally wants to attend the academy instead of Mayfield High with the rest of his friends.
